message.content:
The task is to extract three specific line items and their amounts from the income statement:

1. Total income arising in the course of an entityâ€™s ordinary activities  
   - This would be "Total Revenue" (or equivalent total income line).
2. Carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period  
   - This matches "Cost of Goods Sold."
3. Costs of general management and administration of the entity as a whole  
   - This matches "Administrative Expenses."

From the given problem input:

| Account                 | Amount    | Date       |
|-------------------------|-----------|------------|
| Main Business Revenue   | 791992.51 | 2024-02-03 |
| Total Revenue           | 791992.51 | 2024-02-03 |
| Cost of Goods Sold      | 504930.00 | 2024-02-03 |
| Total Cost              | 504930.00 | 2024-02-03 |
| Gross Profit            | 287062.51 | 2024-02-03 |
| Administrative Expenses | 10432.67  | 2024-02-03 |
| Selling Expenses        | 9828.84   | 2024-02-03 |
| Depreciation            | 117540.62 | 2024-02-03 |
| Financial Expenses      | 3193.59   | 2024-02-03 |
| Total Expenses          | 140995.72 | 2024-02-03 |
| Interest Income         | 5264.70   | 2024-02-03 |
| Profit Before Tax       | 151331.49 | 2024-02-03 |
| Tax Expense             | 39599.66  | 2024-02-03 |
| Net Profit              | 111731.83 | 2024-02-03 |

Following the original line item order in the problem statement:

- Total income from ordinary activities = "Total Revenue" = 791992.51  
- Carrying amount of inventories sold = "Cost of Goods Sold" = 504930.00  
- Costs of general management and administration = "Administrative Expenses" = 10432.67  

Hence,

```json
{"solution": {"value1": "791992.51", "value2": "504930.00", "value3": "10432.67"}}
```
